biotools.summary: Self-Estimation Based Novel lincRNA Filter. Discovery of bona fide novel lincRNAs that are suitable for further functional characterization. Specifically, it implements an algorithm for identifying high-quality single-exonic lincRNAs that were often omitted in many studies.

bioschemas.name: Sebnif
